HOW TO PLAY:

Tap the bubble halos to destroy them. 1 tap for red bubbles, 2 taps for yellow bubbles, and 3 taps for green bubbles. If an arrow bubble appears tap the space next to the arrows. Arrows are also coloured, 1 tap for red arrows, 2 taps for yellow arrows, and 3 taps to destroy the green arrows. DONT TAP ON EMPTY SPACE OR YOU WILL LOSE POINTS. Be as fast as you can, you have one minute to get the highest possible score.

Totally free to play and a great way to pass the time, download it now!!!
